Html:
hi,

I have seen the video "Financial Services Sample Application Overview.wmv". I want to use the wheel control (It has two concentric circle and region splitted (for Credit Cards, Buying a Car ) when place the tags and have scatterview features ) used in ths video to my application.

Thanks in Advance.
Would you be so kind as to provide a link?
